About Me

I’m currently an intern at InPlay.org and a student at Palo Alto High. I'm also a competitive figure skater and a huge nerd. Things I obsess over include, but are not limited to, Harry Potter, The Last Airbender (the TV show, of course), Disney/Pixar movies, and Hamilton.
